verses.roman:
saṅkoca nā kara tumi, āmi--tomāra 'dāsa'
tomāra sevā karile haya hṛdaye ullāsa"

synonyms: saṅkoca—hesitation; nā—not; kara—do; tumi—you; āmi—I; tomāra—your; dāsa—servant; tomāra—your; sevā—service; karile—by rendering; haya—there is; hṛdaye—within the heart; ullāsa—jubilation.
translation: "Therefore please do not be hesitant. I am your servant, and when I serve you my heart becomes jubilant."
